113114.content:
You search the attic and start going through some old boxes, eventually coming across a package of your old Goodnites. You had been a bedwetter for quite long so they happen to be the larger sizes. ''These actually might fit...'' you think as you tear the package open and take one out.

You don't waste any time taking off your pants and undies. You stretch the Goodnite in your hands, the sides stretch quite well and you start stepping into them. They fit! They're pretty tight, but they fit you anyway. You grab the pack and return to your room with it. You toss it on your bed and open one of your desk drawers where you had stashed some pacifiers and a baby bottle. You pop the pacifier in your mouth and get to the kitchen, filling up the bottle with some juice.

Next you...
113114.title: Bedwetting pants.

1131141.content: You turn on the TV and channel surf for a bit. Eventually, you stop, having landed on...
1131141.title: Watch some TV

1131143.content:
After putting on all your "gear" you walked over to the mirror and looked at yourself. Your growth had been stunted when you were young, leaving you to remain a small baby-like size. This had worked out great for your love of diapers. There was even the occasional time that people had thought you were a baby due to your small size, even if you were wearing your normal clothes.

After thinking it over for a while, you decide to "become" a baby for the weekend because you're the only one at home and no one would know you were missing.


Where do you go to become a baby?

A: Sneak into the daycare, they shouldn't be able to remember every last kid's face.
B: Sneak into the backdoor of the toy store and pretend that you're lost, leaving the employees to take care of you.
C: Go to the park and tug on the shirt of a mother you know is lactating, pretending to have lost your mother. She decides to take care of you while you go back with her to the park the next day.
1131143.title: Self Reflection.

You're a 16 year old and still in diapers. Most people don't know why it's not your choice you were never potty trained.

choices: More 16 year olds to pick from
123122.content:
Pick your 16-year-old teenager for the story to be about.

Bridget: A pale natural blonde haired girl with blue eyes. Very short for her age and nearly flat chested. Could easily get mistaken for a kindergartner in the right outfit. A fact that Linda would like to use to her advantage. Secretly wants to be diapered while being treated like a baby full time and loves the idea of wearing and using pampers baby diapers. She finally has the courage and is willing to go very far to make her dream become a reality.

Caitlyn: A pale red haired girl with freckles and green eyes. Normal height for her age with a healthy weight. She is far more interested in bigger bulky diapers.
123122.title: 16 year old teens

choices: She will get some at the store

1231221.title: Bridget

choices: She is with her aunt Linda
12312211.content: One final question as she is at the store getting her baby diapers that fit her. Is she alone or with someone else or a group?
12312211.title: She will get some at the store

choices: Lie saying your luggage is gone to get new clothes
Your luggage is gone!(Aunt secretly got rid of it.)
You get your luaggage and leave the airport
123122111.content:
Aunt Linda was picking you up at the airport. It was the late afternoon following your last day of school until the Summer break began. Your parents decided it would do you some good to go live with your aunt this Summer due to you having a hard time making friends in the new town you had all recently moved to. Your aunt was about a 12 years younger than your mother aged 28. She lived alone in her own home. You had only met her once previously and she seemed nice...

As the two of you walked over to get your luggage....
123122111.title: She is with her aunt Linda

choices: Your aunt sees through your lies
1231221111.content:
While the two of you walked to the luggage carousel a tall passerby knocked into you causing you to fall on the hard floor. Your ankle hurt. As you sat on the ground in pain you tried hard to not to cry. Meanwhile, your aunt began yelling something at the stranger in anger.

Aunt Linda calmed herself down from yelling and knelt on the ground in front of you looking concerned.

"Are you alright Bridget?" Linda asked in a concerned tone. "He didn't hurt you too much right?"

You pointed at your bruised ankle in response.

"That jerk bruised your ankle?" Linda questioned.

"Yeah..."

"I am sorry about that guy Bridget can you walk?" Linda replied.

"I can try."

Your aunt helped you to your feet it hurt a little bit to stand on your ankle but she took you by your hand to finish your walk towards the luggage.

Holding hands with your aunt made you feel like a young child being led guiding by an aunt. Of course, your secret feelings of wishing to be treated much younger made this a happy moment for you.

Once the two of you reached the luggage area your aunt spoke up. "Hey Bridget I need to go to restroom for a minute and after make a phone call will you be alright by yourself?"

"I will be okay auntie."

"Alright just wait for your luggage and if you can't lift it I will help when I get back!"

Looking at the luggage carousel you noticed yours almost instantly. You were going to grab it when you noticed a young girl around your height being picked up by her mother after tripping.

While the girl pouted her mouth looking annoyed just easily picked her up and off they went. The mother was shorter than your aunt...if that girl could be carried by her mom surely your aunt could carry you too?

Giggling as you imagined being picked up like a little girl and carried made you feel somewhat excited. That was when you noticed the girl's cute dress hiked up a little bit to reveal a diaper....

Diapers on a girl as small as you....that means they would fit you easily! You longed to wear diapers but only in your wildest fantasies. There was no way you could have diapers after all your luaggage was filled with your underwear just feet away.

That is when the idea hit you. You could lie to your aunt and tell her your luggage wasn't there! That way you need new underwear! The perfect plan! Nervously you waited for aunt pretending to be looking for your luggage as it went around the carousel again.

20 minutes later your aunt came for you.

"Hey sorry about the wait. I called your mom to tell you that I found you and she wouldn't stop talking!"

"It is alright auntie."

Your aunt looked around confused. "Where is your luggage Bridget?"

"My luggage is gone! I gave up looking for it and I filled out fhe form to report it missing and they told me they will call your phone number when they find it!"
1231221111.title: Lie saying your luggage is gone to get new clothes

choices: Outright says no and looks for another solution
12312211111.content:
"Oh my god seriously?" Linda angrily responded. "I am getting sick of these jerks today first some guy knocks you down and bruises your ankle and next the airline loses your luggage!"

"Yeah, but what I am supposed to do about clothes while I am here auntie?"

"Uh..hmmm how about I buy you some new outfits?" Asked your aunt. "We can use it as a bonding experience!"

"Okay, that sounds great auntie!"

Smiling she tells motions for you follow her. You of course do but do it slowly on purpose pretending your ankle is preventing you from walking a good speed. Linda noticed this.

"Hey, Bridget is your ankle still hurting?" Linda asked you. "Do you need help?"

"Yes, auntie it hurts I don't think I can walk. Will you please carry me?"
12312211111.title: Your aunt believes you

choices: On the way to the story
123122111111.content:
"Of course I will Bridget!" Your very tall Aunt Linda beams as she easily grabs you. "I will hurry us out of here so you don't get too embarrassed being carried by your aunt."

She easily carried you in her arms like a toddler. Of course with your tiny size that is probably what you looked like. No one seemed to think it was odd with her carrying you and walking at a brisk pace. Mentally you were enjoying every second of this feeling smaller and younger than ever. Maybe your dreams of diapers were closer than you thought.

Aunt Linda seems to be focused on getting out to her car to notice anything you are doing. With her brisk walk, she seems to have arrived in the parking lot quite quickly and before you know it the two of you arrived at her vehicle as she set you down on your feet near the front passenger door.

"Sorry about moving so quickly hope it didn't bother you." Linda said looking down at you.

"Oh, it was no problem at all auntie," You say shly. "I actually kinda liked it..."

Your aunt raises an eyebrow before laughing a little assuming you were joking.

The two of you got in the car and away you went towards the store.
123122111111.title: Of course she will!

1231221111111.content:
As the two of you had small talk and listened to the radio in the background suddenly a cop car flashed its light. Your aunt pulled over in confusion.

The cop car pulled right behind your aunts vehicle and the officer got out and began the walk towards your aunt's side of the car. Your aunt started bringing down her window to speak to the officer when he arrived.

"Ma'am, do you know why I pulled you over?" Asked the mustached police officer in sunglasses.

"No, sir," Linda replied.

The cop smiled at you.

"Well, your little girl here clearly looks too young to be sitting in the front passenger seat." He said matter of factly before continuing. "Law states no one under 12 in the front seat. She also might need a carseat for her age."

You were secretly overjoyed that the policeman thought you were much younger than 12! Your aunt looked at you with no expression looking you up and down before turning back to the police officer.

"Sir my niece is actually a teenager." Aunt Linda said. "Shes just short for her age."

The cop looked over in a slight confusion behind his sunglasses.

"Hmmm well, in that case, I will just give you a warning though I still need to check your license and registration." He said. "Although she will need to move to the backseat when you leave for her own safety with her height."

Your aunt nodded and handed the officer her license and registration and he went to check them. Your aunt sighed as she waited in silence with you before the cop returned and gave her back her stuff.

Waving her off you got out of the car and moved to the back seat before your aunt drove off again.
1231221111111.title: On the way to the store

choices: Suggest riding in the shopping cart
She makes you take a motorized scooter for the disabled
12312211111111.content:
As your aunt pulled into the store parking lot you felt the familiar urge of needing to pee and surprisingly the need to poop as well. This could help work to your advantage for getting diapers.

The two of you got out of the car and your aunt started walking before stopping when she realized you were limping behind her slowly.

"Sorry, auntie my ankle still really hurts." You say.

"Don't worry about it its not your fault Bridget," Linda says trying to cheer you up somewhat. "Let me walk with you."

She takes your hand and walks in slowly with you into the store. At the entrance, she grabs a shopping cart.
12312211111111.title: Finally getting to store

choices: Go in your pants in front of your aunt when she gets back
Start crossing your legs to prevent going potty
123122111111111.content:
You see the seat in the shopping cart meant for very young children. You badly want to sit in it. Very badly but you don't know if your aunt would go for it. You decide to play it safe and ask to ride in main part of the shopping cart.

"Aunt Linda, can I ride in the cart so I don't have to walk?" You say looking at the shopping cart. "I mean its better than me limping everywhere."

You turn to look at your aunt and see her seemingly thinking as she looks you up and down at the cart.

"Well, you would probably fit being so small," Linda said. "Are you sure you are okay with this?"

"Yes, auntie!" You reply a little too excitedly. "I need you to put me in it though please."

Linda easily picks you up and gently puts you in the cart.

Afterward, she looks at you kinda funny before shaking her head.

"You know you look kinda cute in there Bridget." Your aunt said. "That being said we should probably take you to the doctor tomorrow if your ankle is still hurting by then."

"I think I will be fine by tomorrow." You reply quickly not wanting to go.

She nodded and walked deeper into the store while pushing the cart you were in. You felt the increasing need to pee and poop.

Enjoying your ride in the cart while feeling super little it suddenly comes to a halt. Looking back at your aunt you see her starting to speak.

"Hey, Bridget we passed by something I want to check out real fast." Linda said. "I will leave the cart right here and be right back!"

Linda walked away leaving you alone in the cart. Looking over to your side you something amazing. Packages of pacifiers!

It was like a goldmine full of riches. You couldn't believe it. Temptation begins to overwhelm you. You wanted one real bad. No, you needed one! Looking around you don't see anyone paying attention to you or your aunt. Quickly you grab a package of a couple pacifiers and set it in your lap. In a flash, you open the package and hurriedly plop one of the pacifiers into your mouth.

Without even thinking you are sucking the pacifier. Somehow it felt amazing and calming at the same time. You were loving this. As you look down at the package you wonder what to do with it. You could toss or you could hide it until you planned to explain it to your aunt. A few seconds of decision you decide to hide it under your skirt.

Happily, you suck the pacifier before a woman passes by. You freeze as she spots you a teenager sucking a pacifier in a shopping cart wondering how she will react. Embarrassment started to flow through you. She just smiles and waves at you though as she passes by. You think you might have let a little pee out when you got caught. Lifting your skirt, sure enough, there's a tiny spot on your white panties. Its been well over a decade since you last peed yourself a little. The feeling makes you feel excited since you are feeling even more little.

The excitement ends a little when you feel the increasing need to pee and poop. You look around and spot your aunt coming back far down the other side of the store she will be there in a minute. You wonder if you should hide the pacifier or just let her catch you with it. Either way you really need to use the toilet soon.
123122111111111.title: Suggest riding in the shopping cart

choices: Linda says nothing and just pushes the cart down an aisle
Aunt Linda starts yelling at you
1231221111111111.content:
Deciding not to hide the pacifier you suck it hard with your back turned towards your aunt. In less than a minute, she would be back to the cart. You really need to use a toilet soon or your pants(skirt actually.). The fear and excitement of being caught sucking the pacifier began to overwhelm you. How was your aunt going to react catching the little teen sucking a pacifier? Even more mischevious thoughts overwhelmed you began to think you should just go potty right in your panties. Your mind was made up you were going to do it.

You felt your aunt grab the back of the shopping cart. The startlement of this opened your bladder enough to let you pee yourself right then and there. Feeling your panties becoming soaked as you sucked the pacifier was incredible. You had no idea if your aunt was noticing you wetting yourself or not but it didn't matter she would certainly notice what you were about to do next.

With a loud fart noise causing you to blush you began to mess your drenched panties. Closing your eyes and sucking your new pacifier you unloaded everything into your panties. You were loving every second. When you finished you opened your eyes to see your aunt looking directly at you with her mouth wide open. The only response you give her is a suckle of your pacifier and a blushing humiliation behind it.
1231221111111111.title: Go in your pants in front of your aunt when she...

choices: Your aunt just looks at toddler outfits for you
An employee asks if your aunt needs help
12312211111111111.content:
Linda eventually closes her mouth after what seems like an eternity. You just sucked the pacifier the entire time locking eyes with her in extreme embarrassment.

Your aunt looks like she wants to say something but the words just don't seem to come. Eventually, she lifts up your skirt all around and inspects your messy and pee stained ruined panties and spots the pacifier package. She grabbed the package and moved it to another part of the cart.

Without saying a word she gets behind the cart and pushes it down the shopping aisle next to you. You can't help but sit in embarrassment wondering if you should speak up.

Suddenly you realize what aisle you are in and your embarrassment goes away instantly. The diaper aisle! Rows upon rows of diapers of various brands. First, the cart passes by all the adult diapers, the bed wetting diapers for kids, and even the pull-ups. The cart stops right in front of the pampers baby diapers. As you eagerly sucked your pacifier in anticipation the cart is filled with a package of pampers, another package, one more after that, and even one last one after that. Your aunt looks down at you with what looks like a mix of anger and disappointment.

Linda looked around and started gathering various baby items to feel the cart with. You noticed the following:
4 packages of pampers baby diapers
Your opened package of pacifier
A diaper bag
Bibs
Baby bottles
Formula
Jars of baby food
A diaper bag
A changing mat
Baby oil
Baby powder

Seeing all this you should feel absolutely humiliated but all you feel is overwhelming joy and happiness. Your aunt moves the cart quickly towards a cashier's lane and buys all the stuff quickly. Pushing you and everything in the cart out to her car. She begins loading everything into the car when she takes the diaper bag and fills it with changing supplies and the extra pacifiers.

Next, she heads back into the store with only the filled diaper bag and you in the shopping cart. As she gets back in the store she immediately heads towards toward the women's restroom. You knew what this meant. Time for diapers. Your pacifier sucking speed rapidly increases as she puts the diaper bag around her shoulder and picks you up like a toddler carrying you into the restroom.

Entering the restroom she goes straight towards the changing table on the wall and sets it up with you on it. You suck the pacifier as she hikes up your skirt and looks at your ruined panties. She slides a pamper under your butt and starts to pull down your poop caked panties that were also drenched from pee. Eventually, she gets it off and immediately throws it in the garbage can without a second glance. You can barely feel the diaper behind your butt as you still have feces caked on your butt.

Aunt Linda starts getting the wipes and cleaning you very thoroughly. Eventually, she finishes. She looks at the pamper under you and notices a little bit of poop and wipes it out with some baby wipes. Your aunt grabs your teen legs and lifts them in the air sliding the pamper diaper under you. She begins powdering your diaper area and tapes up your baby diaper. You are finally diapered for the first time since you were a toddler! The excitement and happiness is unbearable. When she picks you up you hug her instantly in joy.

Your aunt takes you out of the restroom and easily places you in the child seat of the shopping cart. As you are placed in you kinda jump in your seat up and down in happiness smiling behind your pacifier. Your aunt looks at you and pushes the shopping cart toward the toddler clothes section. Somehow you knew they would fit and you felt just as excited when you got put into the diaper.
12312211111111111.title: Linda says nothing and just pushes the cart dow...

choices: Dresses you up in your new clothes
123122111111111111.content:
Finally your aunt speaks up. ''I certainly didn't think this would happen, but apparently there's no other choice...'' she begins and pauses for a brief moment. She then continues her sentence ''...if you're going to have accidents like a little baby I'll have to treat you as such during your stay.'' You do your best to contain your excitement and look embarrassed.

Linda finishes picking up the toddler clothes and after she's paid for them you head to her house. When you pull over to the driveway she stops the car, unloads all the stuff and then picks you up and carries you inside. Now that you've arrived Linda...
123122111111111111.title: Your aunt finally speaks up

12312211113.content:
Your aunt tries to help you by seeing if can get a better view. After a few attempts of her asking if a few bags where yours you decided to pretend to look in another section.

You pretend to look for a few minutes when some luggage catches your eye. It was pink, covered in Care Bears and clearly that of a little girl. You pick it up and begin to look through the bag, finding diapers and baby supplies inside. You decided not to take the bag despite being tempted to but right as you zip it up your aunt walks up.

"Ah you finally found your luggage. Are you ready to go?"

You...
12312211113.title: Your aunt tries to help

1231221112.content:
Aunt Linda told you she was waiting for your luggage as your mom described it on the phone.(Secretly without your knowledge she got and threw it away.) She tells you she already filed a report as it is missing.

After watching the luggage go around a few times you suddenly realize your luggage isn't there looks like she is right!

Your aunt sees you worrying.

"Don't worry we can get you some new outfits, sweetie!" Your aunt beams looking down at you.

You being the mostly silent type just nod and mutter "thank you."

The two of you head off and your aunt drives you straight to a store.
1231221112.title: Your luggage is gone!(Aunt secretly got rid of ...

choices: Stop your aunt at the kids clothes
Head with her to the young adult section
Stop somewhere else in the store
12312211121.content:
(In store adventure 1 Bridget will lead the charge to get diapers!)

As the two of you arrived the store your aunt began leading you to the clothing for young adults. Along the way, you see all the childish clothing and feel a weird feeling in your stomach. You always had a secret. You wanted to be treated much younger and dress younger as well. There was no explanation why you wanted this you just did and you knew the clothes would fit your tiny body. Finally you saw a possible opportunity to make your dream a reality!

The closer you come to completely passing the section the more desperate and antsy you are feeling. Will you attempt to stop your aunt to let you look for clothes here?
12312211121.title: Store adventure 1

choices: It is a nursey and she replaced your outfits from the store
A normal room and you find the diapers unloading the bags
12312211122.content:
(In store adventure 2 Linda gets you diapers for some reason which you find yourself unable to resist and put one on secretly loving it.)


The two of you arrive at the store and after hours of trying on what must have been hundreds of outfits your aunt gets you about a week's worth of clothing. When you walk by the baby section there is some diapers. This reminds you that you could really use a toilet!

"Aunt Linda I just need the toilet real quick!" You say looking up at your aunt.

Aunt Linda smiled.

"Take your time I will just head to the registers and buy your new clothes!" Linda replied sweetly.

As you run to the restroom your aunt meanwhile noticed the diapers.

"Well, that was perfect timing." Your aunt says to herself as you are out of her range for hearing her.

Aunt Linda unbeknownst to you grabbed a package of baby diapers that would fit you and bought them along with your new outfits.

While on the toilet it seems you need to go number two as well and you have no idea how long you take.

When you get out your aunt is waiting for you with bags full of your new clothes! The two of you head home. Aunt Linda and you bring in your bags from the store and she reveals your room!
12312211122.title: Store adventure 2

choices: Put on a diaper right away
Go home and put it on there
123122112.content:
Bridget walks into the store and nervously walks around for a while, gathering the courage to go and grab a package of diapers from the shelf. She makes sure there aren't any familiar people at the store, bumping into someone and having to explain her purchase of baby diapers is the last thing she wants to do.

When she's certain that the coast is clear, she walks to the diaper aisle and looks at the collection of different diapers on the shelf. She grabs a package of Pampers size 7 diapers and after a bit of consideration also grabs a pack of Pull Ups.

She pays for her purchases and heads out. On her way she sees a family restroom and gets an idea, she'd be a little tempted to put the diaper on already instead of waiting to get home. Eventually she decides to...
123122112.title: She is alone of course

123122113.content: Final options before the story start. Who exactly is she shopping with and going to get baby diapers with?
123122113.title: She is with someone else

choices: See how it would feel to use it
Dig out some baby stuff from the basement
Just enjoy the diaper for now
12312212.content:
This is what you've been waiting for, finally your parents are going away for the weekend and you have the entire house just for yourself. So it's time to indulge in your fantasies now that you have the privacy needed for it. You had already purchased a package of baby diapers and carefully hidden them in your room.

So as soon as you watch your parents drive away you waste no time tearing open the pack of diapers, taking one out and unfolding it. You then take off your pants and place the diaper on your bed and sit on it. After adjusting your position a little you position the front panel over your parts and fasten the tapes so the diaper snugly hugs your hips. A huge smile spreads on your face when you jump up from bed and look at yourself in the mirror, you are indeed diapered after all these years!

The diaper feels so soft and comfortable between your legs and looks cute too. So now you decide to...
12312212.title: She already has them

choices: Start playing with the contents of the box
Go back in the basement and get more things!
123122122.content:
Satisfied that your dreams are coming true you head downstairs to help fulfill them further!

In the back corner, you find a box simply labeled "Bridget's baby stuff". Exactly what you are looking for. With glee, you grab the box and hurry and take it back to your room your diaper crinkling with every step. A fact that you love. As you set the box on your bed you go back downstairs and spot your old changing table. Being that you're a tiny teenager to begin with it is hard to get it and you struggle since its bigger than you. With Sadness of not being able to get it up the stairs you head back upstairs. Going into your room your smile comes back as you grasp the box looking at it wondering what stuff is in there.

You open the box to reveal many babyish items from when you were a real baby.
123122122.title: Dig out some baby stuff from the basement

choices: Stay in the wet diaper for a while
See if you can poop too
1231221222.content:
You start going through the stuff in the box and grab two of your old baby bottles. You get an idea and head to the kitchen with them. You fill the first one with just water before opening the fridge and finding some juice, which you fill the second one with.

Now that you've got two bottles for yourself, you head to the living room and turn on the tv. You put on some cartoons, wrap yourself up with a blanket and hop on the couch. You sit and watch the cartoons while enjoying your bottles. After finishing them you put a pacifier in your mouth and continue enjoying the cartoons.

About 20 minutes later the juice and water have done their job, you need to pee! You blush a little when you realize what you're about to do. You decide to climb down from the couch and sit on the floor in case the diaper leaks, because ruining the expensive couch isn't something you'd like to do. ''Okay, here goes'' you say out loud. It's surprisingly difficult to wet yourself after all these years since your brain keeps telling you this isn't what you're supposed to do. But eventually you manage to get a stream going. You gasp a little when you feel the warm wetness spreading under your backside. The diaper seems to be holding well so you just let it all go and it doesn't take long until the diaper is completely soaked.

You giggle as you feel the diaper with your hand, it's really swollen and sags heavily between your legs. You decide to...
1231221222.title: Grab something from the box

choices: You sit in your wet and messy diaper a while
You go to change your diaper
Surprise! Mommy is home and she saw everything!
12312212223.content:
You're very happy that you wet your baby diaper with no leaks. It made you feel so small knowing you could wet a real baby diaper with a very heavy wetting and not have to worry about leaking. As you suckle pacifier looking at the cute soaked pampers on your waist you feel the familiar feeling...you need to poop!

Could you really mess your diaper too? Would it hold it all despite the fact that you soaked your diaper with a very heavy wetting? Only one way to find you think as you smile behind your pacifier.

Slowly you get on into a squatting position as your diaper sags and suck your pacifier as you start to push. Minutes later nothing is coming out! Next, you get on your hands and knees putting your butt into the air. You close your eyes in push gently as you suck your pacifier harder and faster. Slowly it seems to be coming out filling your already drenched diaper. It finally ends and you open your eyes and sit on your butt squishing the mess throughout the diaper. Luckily your baby diaper is holding everything even if it is starting to smell awful!
12312212223.title: See if you can poop too

123122122231.content:
Then, once you sat down, you moaned through the pacifier. You began to move around and to feel the wet and messy diaper feeling so good. You kept on squishing your wet and messy diaper as it the wetness from her pee felt so warm, and the messiness from her poop felt so smooth. That’s when you decided to “Stay in my wet and poopy diapie for a while!”

You smiled as you decided to turn off the T.V. and decided to head for bed. You lied down as you began to move around your wet and messy butt to feel the goodness of your naughtiness as you moaned.

You sucked on the pacifier harder and harder as you enjoy pleasuring yourself and then you reached the limit and collapsed on your bed. You then smile as you rub your wet and messy diaper and say “I’m going to wear these diapers and be a baby forever.” You giggle through the pacifier as you get some bars and turned your bed into a crib. You get some stuff animals as you laid in your crib. You smile as you closed your eyes and went to sleep, hugging the stuffed animals, sucking your pacifier and kept on rubbing and loving your wet and messy diaper. Later...
123122122231.title: You sit in your wet and messy diaper a while

choices: Wants to try diapers as well
1231221222311.content:
You wake up a few hours later and the diaper is now starting to feel a bit nasty. ''I better go get changed...'' you think and get up, heading to the bathroom. You open the tapes and remove the diaper and toss it to the trash. You then carefully clean yourself with baby wipes and put on a new, clean diaper.

After getting changed you hop on the living room sofa and watch some more TV. Some time later you hear the door being opened and your heart skips a beat. ''Yo Bridget, I'm here!'' you hear a familiar voice shouting, it's your best friend Cass. You had completely forgotten that she was supposed to come over today. And you also had completely forgotten to lock the door, it seems.

''The door was open so I just came in...'' she says and pauses when she sees you wearing nothing more than a bra and a baby diaper. ''What's up with that?'' she asks.

Knowing that you've been caught, your face turns red when you stutter ''I...I...well I just like wearing these...'' you figure you might as well just admit it. Since she's your best friend you hope she won't make fun of you or tell anyone.

Cass gets a grin on her face and...
1231221222311.title: She woke up.

choices: You hear Cass leave your house
Cass tells you through your door she is already posting the pics on social media
12312212223113.content:
Cass pulls out her phone and immediately begins taking pictures of you. As she grins you can't help but notice how sinister it is.

"Oh my god Bridget this is too funny!" Cass says. "I can't wait to show the popular girls at school this will get me in their group for sure!"

You are like a deer in headlights. Never in a million years did you expect your best friend to betray you like this. Tears start building in your eyes.

"Awww is baby going to cry?" Cass says in a mocking tone as you do begin to cry. "Perfect Bridget these pictures are perfect!"

You run away sobbing upstairs to your room and close it.
12312212223113.title: Something else

123122122232.content:
For a little while you crawl on the floor in your soaked and messy diaper, but it soon gets a bit uncomfortable and the smell is also too much. So you get up and waddle to the bathroom, giggling at the sight of the diaper swinging between your legs as you do.

You undo the tapes and throw away the diaper. You then look at the baby wipes you also had bought, but after a bit of thinking you figure that it'll probably be better to just wash your messy bum in the shower. After carefully cleaning yourself you grab a towel and dry up. Then you take out a new diaper, unfold it and once again place it on the floor and sit on it. ''Oh, I almost forgot!'' you say to yourself and sprinkle some baby powder on your diaper area before diapering yourself.

Now that you once again have a clean bum and a dry diaper, you decide to...
123122122232.title: You go to change your diaper

Irene is a five-year-old who wets the bed and is required to be diapered before going to bed. Unfortunately for you she absolutely hates wearing diapers.

Maria is a mischevious ten year old who enjoys tricking her babysitters. For her newest prank she wants her babysitter in a diaper.

There is also an other option for other girls.

You see your sis pull out a toy gun. Thinking nothing of it you went back to texting on your phone.

Right before you sit down you heard the toy go off and felt something hot it your butt.

"What did you just do to me!" You shouted

"You'll see sis, just remeber this is why I get what I want." Kim said

Just then you fell your/yourself _____

info.brief_description: Teens end up diapered, how and why is up to you
info.description:
Rules:

Use proper grammar and spelling
Try to make new chapters at least one paragraph long
No death, vore or explicit sex scenes
Body swapping, regression and shrinking are ok but no shrinking under 1ft.
info.pretty_title: Teens end up back in diapers
